mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Mountain (`name`, latitude, longitude, altitude, course, difficulty, fee, state, town, point) VALUE (#{name}, #{latitude}, #{longitude}, #{altitude}, #{course}, #{difficulty}, #{fee}, #{state}, #{town}, #{point})
mapper.select: SELECT u.serial AS userSerial, m.serial AS mountainSerial, m.name AS mountainName, c.reg_date AS commentRegDate, m.difficulty AS difficulty, m.state AS state FROM User u, Mountain m, comment c WHERE u.serial = c.user_serial AND m.serial = c.mountain_serial AND c.user_serial = #{userSerial};
